title: r/Trump calls protestors "Subhumans", advocates the declaration of Martial Law

author: JakeT-life-is-great
text: and they get surprised when people call them racists and bigots.

author: Gotta_be_SFW
text:
How dare you call me a Nazi while I use literal Nazi rhetoric while supporting government sanctioned killing of citizens I feel are beneath me?

No, you're the real Nazi. Remember, they are socialists just like your (insert insult) (insert play on the word democrats).

The number of times I have seen this defense is truly mind bottling.

author: [deleted]
text:
And every debate **has** to always include a personal attack. Then when you ask them about why they insulted you during a debate, they call you a snowflake.

It’s... it’s like arguing with a small child, but a small child who shits on the wall and smiles as you have to clean it up.

author: Gotta_be_SFW
text: But because they had the last word, they claim a win.

author: jdickey
text: Doesn't that imply that one has a mind to boggle?

author: [deleted]
text: That’s the word! I couldn’t think of it.
